body: So uncle is her first love but since they're relatives so she tries to forgot about him and accepted a confession then got a boyfriend for the first time and is about to lose her virginity  but her uncle interrupted them then uncle touches her which triggers her subconsciousness then all her love which she suppresses returned. Her parents suddenly returned home without prior notice. They tried to hide their relationship bbut got caught and thought that they would get into trouble but they didn't saying. They got married and lived happily.
